1.description: Stop the Confluence server to apply necessary updates.

2.description: Upgrade to the fixed version of Confluence as per Atlassian's upgrading instructions.

3.description: If unable to immediately apply upgrades, restrict untrusted network access until feasible.

4.description: Quarantine and take offline potentially affected hosts.

7.description: Report the compromise to CISA, FBI, or MS-ISAC.
